import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col,Image, ListGroup,Card, Button, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; const ProductScreen = ({match} ) => { const [product,setProduct] = useState({}) useEffect(() => { const fetchProduct = async ()=> { const {data} = await axios.get(`/api/products/${match.params.id}`) setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() },[]) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: {product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: {product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In stock' : 'Out of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen
